means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 克洛西尔职业名称，布和衣服制作者或销售者，来源于中世纪英语，含义是“布”(cloth)+后缀ier

sentence.Network_en: Morgenroth the clothier and Gibson the dry goods man. "

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English clother, from cloth. The change in the ending was due to association with -ier

means.word_mean: 1. a merchant who sells men's clothing
